CHAT.comment: INV enters the room with car.
child and dad go over to play with car.
child picks up car and then throws it on the ground.
child bends down to play with car on the floor.
dad turns child around to face the camera.
child picks up car and throws it on the floor.
dad reaches in his pocket and pulls out a coin.
child and dad roll car across the floor.
child gets up and hides under the table.
child gets out from under the table and starts making faces in the mirror.
child and dad roll car across the floor.
dad opens up trunk and points to coins inside the car.
child gets up and lies down on the couch.
child and dad leave room to go get a drink.
talking goes on in the hallway.
dad and child return from drinking fountain.
child helps INV take cover off computer box.
child pushes sensors on computer box and computer box beeps.
child screams loudly at computer box.
child and dad put their hands in front of computer box sensors.
child pushes sensor and computer box beeps.
child makes noises and faces at mirror.
child sticks out her tongue and makes a loud noise.
child waddles across the floor and makes noises.
INV leaves room to get next toy.
child falls on dad and hugs him.
INV enters the room with Robodog.
child jumps out of the way.
child and dad talk to Robodog.
dad and child talk to Robodog.
child picks up Robodog and carries him out of the corner.
dad and child talk to Robodog.
dad and child talk to degu.
INV removes degu from the room.
INV enters room with the meerkat.
child makes meerkat dance and sings.
INV and child uncover starfish tank.
dad moves his hand around the side of the glass.
dad tries to move starfish tank.
child points to algae in the tank.
child points to algae in tank.
camera is moved and dad and child are no longer in the picture.
